name: Bomb Jack ZX Spectrum Next / N-GO
name_original: Bomb Jack ZX Spectrum Next / N-GO
description:
Bomb Jack for ZX Spectrum Next, made with Nextbuild and ZX Basic Boriel, thanks to David Saphier and Jose Rodriguez for its tools and personalized help.

Thanks also to Juan Segura - Duefectu for his help.

Requirements - Zx Spectrum Next or compatible with 1Mb ram.

Don't have ZX Spectrum Next to play? 

You can purchase an N-GO (100% compatible with ZX Spectrum Next) here.

https://manuferhi.com/p/n-go-complete-case-keyboard-negro-black
